name: I Want You To Come Back
name_original: I Want You To Come Back
description:
Video Game Trailer:

After returning from a mission at the United States Space Station you have came back home but everything isn't like what it's used to be. But your sister has left some clues at the mall you two used to frequent.

Search the mall and find the relics to unlock the next area. And find out what happened!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use (W,A,S,D) to walk

(E) to inspect

(TAB) to open inventory/ options

Created by:

Alex Bloem

Bio: Alex Bloem is an animation major at Massart. He/They will be graduating from Massart in 2022. They have always enjoyed playing video games, but found it just as fun (if not a little exhausting) to actually making one! Roles on this project: 3D modeler, Art Director, Texture Artist. Follow the Journey: @narci_cism on insta, NarciCism on youtube. 

Cailigh MacDonald

Bio: Cailigh MacDonald is graduate student in the Dynamic Media Institute at Massachusetts College of Art, graduating in 2022. She is an Exhibit Designer and Sculptor focusing on immersive educational experiences which drew her to getting her feet wet with game design. Her roles on this project were Project Manager and general asset creation (3D models and textures) to help support the art direction.

Mike

Bio:  an experienced coder, who was in charge of all the programming for the game.  

Benjamin Mao


Bio: Senior in animation at MASSART, learning to make games is a fun experience for my gamer heart! Roles: 3D Modeler
